name: Ashish Gram Rachna Trust
briefDescription: Programme at the rural site has 3 components:1. Empowerment of unmarried adolescent girls through ‘Life Skills Education’.2. Attitudinal change in unmarried and young married men to demonstrate a measurable change in the prevalence of domestic violence and gender inequitable behaviors 3. Protection of young married women from the adverse consequences of early marriage.Beneficiary population 42,000The Trust is implementing a primary health care project in the urban slums of Pune city, a successful model of health care for urban poor, which has resulted in improved access to maternal neonatal and child health services.Beneficiary population 20,000
